title: windows binary build: hg invoked without $http_proxy
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

C:\gobuild>dist windows-amd64
2012/03/06 20:22:22 readCredentials: open .gobuildkey: The system cannot find th
e file specified.
abort: error: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not pr
operly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because
connected host has failed to respond
2012/03/06 20:26:14 windows-amd64: hg clone -q https://code.google.com/p/go C:\U
sers\user1\AppData\Local\Temp\bindist183641394\go: exit status 255


What is the expected output?

dist.exe should be able to build the msi when behind a company firwall that provide
http_proxy access to Internet.

Please provide http_proxy as dist.exe command arguments or advise where to advise where
to set http_proxy in a config file.

Ex:
dist windows-amd64 http_proxy=http://my.corp.com:1020
